Name: Dark Drop Lv.2
Description: Use to increase Dark resistance and reduce DMG taken from Dark skills. Recommended when challenging Tina - Mindrealm, Dark Mist Fortress, and related dungeons.
Description$english: Use to increase Dark resistance and reduce DMG taken from Dark skills. Recommended when challenging Tina - Mindrealm, Dark Mist Fortress, and related dungeons.
Description2$english: "The brief overexposure sensation after taking this product is similar to that of the Light Drop. Please be sure to confirm by color before taking to avoid confusion."

recipes.Name: Intermediate: Dark Drop
recipes.Des:
Crafting yields products Lv.1 and Lv.2 at rates of 20% and 80%, respectively.
This dark-distilled Drop is carried by adventurers to amplify their Dark resistance for a brief duration.
recipes.Des$english:
Crafting yields products Lv.1 and Lv.2 at rates of 20% and 80%, respectively.
This dark-distilled Drop is carried by adventurers to amplify their Dark resistance for a brief duration.

NeedMaterial.Name: Dark Particle Lv.2
NeedMaterial.Description: Alchemy material used to craft Dark Serum and Dark Drop.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Alchemy material used to craft Dark Serum and Dark Drop.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A crystal particle of the Dark, with Dark rippling like shadows within the crystal, reminiscent of ripples in the night.

recipes.Name: Dark Particle Lv.2
recipes.Des: Alchemy material used to craft Dark Serum and Dark Drop. Obtained from Artisanry​.
recipes.Des$english: Alchemy material used to craft Dark Serum and Dark Drop. Obtained from Artisanry​.

NeedMaterial.Name: Dark Crystal Shard Lv.2
NeedMaterial.Description: Can be obtained during Monster Hunts, and after precise processing, it can be used for Alchemy. It is a basic material.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Can be obtained during Monster Hunts, and after precise processing, it can be used for Alchemy. It is a basic material.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A crystal rich in Engram. Easy to collect and process. Due to absorbing Engram from the atmosphere and underground during crystallization, its specific composition and shape vary by region.

NeedMaterial.Name: Potion Catalyst - RES
NeedMaterial.Description: A material needed for Alchemy that can activate the elemental resistance abilities within raw materials.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: A material needed for Alchemy that can activate the elemental resistance abilities within raw materials.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Two substances that originally do not interact will undergo a transformation upon contact with a specific medium. This change induced by a specific substance is vividly referred to as the "catalyst effect" in alchemical techniques.

recipes.Name: Potion Catalyst - RES
recipes.Des: Two substances that originally do not interact will undergo a transformation upon contact with a specific medium. This change induced by a specific substance is vividly referred to as the "catalyst effect" in alchemical techniques.
recipes.Des$english: Two substances that originally do not interact will undergo a transformation upon contact with a specific medium. This change induced by a specific substance is vividly referred to as the "catalyst effect" in alchemical techniques.

NeedMaterial.Name: Tartberry Juice
NeedMaterial.Description: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.

NeedMaterial.Name: Horn
NeedMaterial.Description: A field-harvested resource that can be reprocessed by life professions.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: A field-harvested resource that can be reprocessed by life professions.
